name: Morpheus 98
description:
Delve into the dream and make use of the abilities it provides in hopes of uncovering its secrets...

Morpheus 98 Is a PlayStation 1 Inspired walking sim adventure game, that takes ideas and concepts from my own dreams and other sources of inspiration like LSD: Dream Emulator and Yume Nikki. 

Morpheus 98 was created for my Final Year Project at Teesside University from January- May,  2020
